# The `LazyCallGraphAnalysis` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An analysis pass which computes the call graph for a module. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

An analysis pass which computes the call graph for a module.

Definition at line 1259 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/lazycallgraph-h">LazyCallGraph.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### run() {#a2b4c0dcc83d56146b52f6825c093b9db}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LazyCallGraph llvm::LazyCallGraphAnalysis::run (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp; M, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af9c9208365fd9ce11392b4d79485e259">ModuleAnalysisManager</a> &amp; AM)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Compute the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazycallgraph">LazyCallGraph</a></code> for the module <code>M</code>.

This just builds the set of entry points to the call graph. The rest is built lazily as it is walked.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/lazycallgraph-h/#l01272">1272</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/lazycallgraph-h">LazyCallGraph.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
